input.sentences: everyone came in support of the civil rights parade .
there were many people of all races there .
they wanted to make a statement .
people held up signs with different sayings .
lots of people felt strongly about this .
output.sentences: They were ready to support the rights of the community at the parade.
Different races of people would come together.
They were here to make a statement.
Signs with supportive messages held by different people.
This gathering strongly showed how people can make a difference in lots of others lives.
